import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get user's assigned rooms"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/rooms"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the list of location rooms assigned to a user. Rooms represent physical spaces (classrooms, offices, labs) that the user is associated with for ticket routing and reporting.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user. Extract `Items[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) â†’ extract UserId.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/users/\{UserId\}/rooms](/docs/api/users/get-user-rooms) to retrieve assigned rooms.
3. Use returned LocationRoomId values for add/remove operations.

**Minimal Required Fields**: UserId (path)

**Notes**: Results are paged via `$p` and `$s` query parameters. For bulk room lookups across many users, use [POST /api/v1.0/users/rooms/get](/docs/api/users/get-user-rooms-bulk).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"User identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Page size.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
